[[Category:Atlas]]
[[Category:Dungeons]]
[[File:AnkhEntrance.png|425px|thumb|right|The Entrance is located underneath the North East Marble Building on Marble Island.]]
__TOC__
=Notes=
* The Entrance is located underneath the North East Marble Building on Marble Island.
* While this dungeon can be reached by boat, you may be best off visiting your local rune library for a rune!
* Creatures are closely bunched together throughout, watch your back!
* There are many fire traps, which cannot normally be seen and will often not let you move in a straight line down most hallways and corridors.
* It is NOT RECOMMENDED to "run" inside this dungeon, as firetraps will damage you as fast as you can move into them. You want to "walk" and if you take damage STOP MOVING!
=Level 1 - Catacombs=
[[File:AhnkLevelCatacombsMap.PNG|425px|thumb|right|Level 1 - Catacombs]]
The Entrance of Ahnk leads to the Catacombs that reek of death, which is an unholy sanctuary for many forms of evil. This catacomb is very large and there are halls leading to rooms and areas such as:
* Multiple Crypts and a large underground Graveyard
* A few Libraries and Laboratories
* Stables and Jails
* Corrupted Church and Music Hall
* Torture Room and Sacrificial Altars

<gallery mode="packed" class="right">
File:AnkhGY.png|Graveyard
File:AnkhStable.png|Stables			
File:AnkhEntranceToEleland.png|Entrance to Elemental Lands
File:AnkhEntranceSerpentine.png|Entrance to Serpentine Passage
</gallery>
==Dungeon Boss==
Beware adventurers, within the great Graveyard in the North East area the [[Dungeon_Bosses#Warlock|Warlock]] can be found! He is one of the many [[Dungeon_Bosses|Dungeon Bosses]] that inhabit the lands of Sosaria.

=Level 2a - Elemental Lands=
[[File:AnkhLevelElementalLandsMap.PNG|425px|thumb|right|Level 2a - Elemental Lands]]
Near the Lich Nest is the entrance to the Elemental Land which is almost every elemental type can be found. This level is a mountainous chasm carved with narrow valleys that groups elementals into their various common elemental type and these congregations can bee seen in a few scenic areas such as:
* Swamps and Lava pits
* Altars and Temples
* Winding Valleys

=Level 2b - Serpentine Passage=
[[File:AhnkLevelSerpentinePassageMap.PNG|425px|thumb|right|Level 2b - Serpentine Passage]]
Following the steps North from the Music Hall will lead you to Serpentine Passage. Beware that it is forbidden by Britannian Law to be within this Land of Fey! Sosarians will find themselves in criminal status as it is considered trespassing to travel to these lands per Britannian Law. You may also find that those with negative Karma may be attacked on sight by the Fey that live in these lands. There is little known of this area except these 2 major landmarks:
* Concert Stage
* Temple of the Unicorn

<gallery mode="packed" class="right">
File:AhnkLevelSerpentinePassageEntranceToTheCatacombs.PNG|Entrance to the Catacombs
File:AnkhSerpentineCreatures.png|Serpentine Dragons
File:AhnkLevelSerpentinePassageTempleOfTheUnicorn.PNG|Temple of the Unicorn
</gallery>
